# Load carbapenemase data
```{r}
carbapenemase_content <- readRDS("./data/carbapenemase_content/carbapenemase_content_merged_studies.RDS")
df <- left_join(df,carbapenemase_content)

format_blaKPC_md <- function(gene) {
  gene <- trimws(gene,which='both')
  if(grepl("^bla", gene)){
    allele <- gsub("bla", "", gene)
    paste0("<i>bla</i><sub>", allele, "</sub>") %>% trimws(.,which='both')
  }  else {
    if(grepl("No carbapenemase",gene) == T ){
      paste0("No carbapenemase") 
    } else {
      paste0("") 
    }
  } 
}

carbapenemase_markdown <- str_split(df$carbapenemase,pattern = "&",simplify=T)
carbapenemase_markdown[,1] <- sapply(carbapenemase_markdown[,1],format_blaKPC_md)
carbapenemase_markdown[,2] <- sapply(carbapenemase_markdown[,2],format_blaKPC_md)
colnames(carbapenemase_markdown) <- c("c1","c2")
df$carbapenemase_md <- apply(carbapenemase_markdown,1,FUN=function(x){
  if(x['c2']==''){
    paste0(x['c1'])
  } else {
    paste0(x['c1']," & ",x['c2'])
  }
})
```

# A. Fill being carbapenemase
```{r}
genotypes <- c(table(df$carbapenemase_md %>% subset(.!="No carbapenemase")) %>% sort(decreasing = T) %>% names,"No carbapenemase")
genotype_colors <- setNames(c(hues::iwanthue(length(genotypes)-1,hmin = 5,cmin = 5,lmin = 5),"gray"), genotypes)

genotype_scale <- scale_fill_manual(breaks = genotypes,values = genotype_colors,name = "Carbapenemase", guide = guide_legend(ncol=4, title.position = "top", label.position = "right")) 

get_factor_order_carb <- function(ST_dist,var){
  new_order <- ST_dist %>% subset(study =='2021-23') %>% arrange(-n) %>% subset(n>0) %>% .[[var]] 
  zero_new_order_old <- ST_dist %>% subset(study =='2014-15') %>% subset(!get(var) %in% new_order) %>% arrange(-n) %>% .[[var]]
  c(c(new_order,zero_new_order_old) %>% subset(.!="No carbapenemase"),"No carbapenemase")
}

carb_dist <-  df  %>%
  count(study, carbapenemase_md) %>%
  complete(study, carbapenemase_md, fill = list(n = 0)) %>%
  group_by(study) %>%
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n) * 100)

df$carbapenemase_md <- factor(df$carbapenemase_md,levels = get_factor_order_carb(carb_dist,'carbapenemase_md'))
df <- df %>% arrange(carbapenemase_md)  

A <- ggplot(data=df,
       aes(y=carbapenemase_md, fill=carbapenemase_md)) +
  geom_bar()  + genotype_scale + facet_wrap(~study) +
  geom_text(stat='count',
            aes(label=..count..),
            hjust=-0.05, # push slightly to the right
            size=3.5)  +
  xlim(NA, 420.1) +
  theme_bw_me +
  xlab("Isolates") + ylab("") +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size=12, color="black"),
    axis.text.y = element_markdown(size=12, color="black"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 14, color="black"),
                  legend.text =   element_text(size=12, color="black"),
                  legend.title = element_text(size = 12, color="black"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 0, color="black"),
    legend.position = "none",
    strip.text = element_text(size=14,color='black')
  )

A
```


## C. Species ST
```{r} 
get_factor_order <- function(ST_dist,var){
  new_order <- ST_dist %>% subset(study =='2021-23') %>% arrange(-n) %>% subset(n>0) %>% .[[var]] 
  zero_new_order_old <- ST_dist %>% subset(study =='2014-15') %>% subset(!get(var) %in% new_order) %>% arrange(-n) %>% .[[var]]
  c(c(new_order,zero_new_order_old) %>% subset(.!="Singleton STs"),"Singleton STs")
}
 
ST_dist <-  df  %>%
  count(study, Species_ST_recode) %>%
  complete(study, Species_ST_recode, fill = list(n = 0)) %>%
  group_by(study) %>%
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n) * 100)
   
df$Species_ST_recode <- factor(df$Species_ST_recode,levels = get_factor_order(ST_dist,'Species_ST_recode'))

C <- ggplot(data=df,
       aes(y=Species_ST_recode, fill=carbapenemase_md)) +
  geom_bar()  +
  theme_bw_me +
  xlab("Isolates") + ylab("") +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size=12, color="black"),
    axis.text.y = element_markdown(size=12, color="black"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 14, color="black"),
                  legend.text =   element_text(size=12, color="black"),
                  legend.title = element_text(size = 12, color="black"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 0, color="black"),
    legend.position = "none",
    strip.text = element_text(size=14,color='black')) + genotype_scale + facet_wrap(~study)

C
```

# B. Compare carbapenemase genotypes between studies
```{r} 
ST_dist <-  df  %>%
  count(study, carbapenemase_md) %>%
  complete(study, carbapenemase_md, fill = list(n = 0)) %>%
  group_by(study) %>%
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n) * 100)
   
get_factor_order_carb <- function(ST_dist,var){
  new_order <- ST_dist %>% subset(study =='2021-23') %>% arrange(-n) %>% subset(n>0) %>% .[[var]] 
  zero_new_order_old <- ST_dist %>% subset(study =='2014-15') %>% subset(!get(var) %in% new_order) %>% arrange(-n) %>% .[[var]]
  c(c(new_order,zero_new_order_old) %>% subset(.!="No carbapenemase"),"No carbapenemase")
}
   
B <- ggplot(ST_dist %>% subset(n>0),aes(x = study,stratum = carbapenemase_md,alluvium = carbapenemase_md,y=prop,fill = carbapenemase_md)) +
  geom_alluvium(aes(fill = carbapenemase_md),width=0.66,alpha=0.75) +
  geom_stratum(width=0.66,linewidth = 0.2) + theme_bw_me + xlab("Study") + ylab("Percentage (%)") + genotype_scale + theme(legend.position = "bottom",
                  axis.text =   element_markdown(size=12, color="black"),
                  axis.title = element_text(size = 14, color="black"),
                  legend.text =   element_markdown(size=8, color="black"),
                  legend.title = element_markdown(size = 10, color="black"),
                  plot.title = element_text(size = 14, color="black")) + ggtitle("All isolates")

B
```
